column4: guntbert,,i want  use  yahoo messenger with video  and voice chat option in  ubuntu... but i don't know how? can u pls help me on this regard?
add the https://launchpad.net/~loell/+archive/ppa repository (instructions on the page) and install gyachi
you're welcome, yes it does have voice/video chat enabled
:) haven't used it recently, hope it works fo you
